import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { TiTimes,TiEdit,TiInputChecked } from 'react-icons/ti'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import {deleteModule, updateModule, createModule, editModule, okModule} from "../actions/moduleActions" const ModuleListComponent = ({ //want to receive data from reducer course = {}, modules = [], deleteModule, createModule, updateModule, okModule, editModule }) =>

Modules for {course.title}

    { modules.map(module =>
  • {module.editing &&
    updateModule({ ...module, title:event.target.value })}/> okModule(module)}>
    } {!module.editing && {module.title} editModule(module)}> deleteModule(module)}> }
    • ) }
createModule(course)} >+
const propertyToDispatchMapper = (dispatch) => ({ deleteModule: (module) => deleteModule(dispatch, module), createModule: () => createModule(dispatch), updateModule: (module) => updateModule(dispatch, module), editModule: (module) => editModule(dispatch, module), okModule: (module) => okModule(dispatch, module), }) const stateToPropertyMapper = (state) => ({ modules: state.moduleReducer.modules, course: state.courseReducer.course }) export default connect (stateToPropertyMapper,propertyToDispatchMapper) (ModuleListComponent)
